title: Oral Care
description: Regular dental care is essential for your pet's health. Brush their teeth several times a week with pet-safe toothpaste.
tips: Watch for signs of dental disease

title: Weight Management
description: Maintain a healthy weight for your pet through proper diet and regular exercise. Consult your vet for ideal weight ranges.
tips: Limit treats to 10% of daily calories

title: Common Conditions
description: Learn to recognize signs of common health issues in pets and when to seek veterinary care.
